title: Best Nonstick Pans 2026

metaDescription: Compare the best nonstick pans of 2026 for daily cooking and easy cleanup.

faq.question: How long should a nonstick pan last?
faq.answer: With normal use and gentle cleaning, most nonstick pans last 2-4 years.
